title: Vegan Pizza
typeOfFood: Vegan, Pizza, Italian, Organic, Fast food, Delivery, Take-out
description: First vegan pizzeria in Warsaw, est. Dec 2014, offering traditional and gluten-free pizzas using local farm produce. Vegan cheese is soy-free, gluten-free. Sauces are house-made. Drinks include shakes, fruit smoothies, fair trade coffee, and tea. Also serves cakes. Entrance is on Wilcza street.
